summary: An Ordinance repealing Ordinance No. 25295, entitled, "An Ordinance authorizing and directing the City Engineer to incur an indebtedness in an amount not to exceed Three Hundred and 50/100 Dollars ($350.00) against the General Fund on account of the cost and expense of the improvement of 18th Avenue Northeast by the connection of concrete walks, as authorized by Resolution No. 2857," approved October 13th, 1910.
